name: Studio 75
description:
A deathmatch to the sweet sound of the Bee Gees!

This is the final prototype I built for a simple multiplayer networked FPS game, blending in elements of Disco for fun.  

Controls

WSAD to move 

Space to jump

Left Click to shoot 

Needs Steam to be open and logged into, so you can play with friends!

Feedback

Thank you for checking out Studio 75! If you have any thoughts or questions please comment down below! 

At the moment there are quite a few bugs, but I am unable to keep working on it at this time :)
